content: बाढ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} ({%<ab>compar.</ab>%} साधीयस्; {%<ab>superl.</ab>%} साधिष्ठ) {@--1@} Firm, strong. {@--2@} Much, excessive. {@--3@} Loud. --ढं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Assuredly, certainly, surely, really; oh yes (in answer to questions); चाणक्यः --चंदनदास एष ते निश्चयः . चंदन-बाढं एष मे स्थिरो निश्चयः <ls>Mu. 1</ls>; बाढमेषु दिवसेषु पार्थिवः कर्म साधयति पुत्रजन्मने <ls>R. 19. 52.</ls> {@--2@} Very well, be it so, good. {@--3@} Exceedingly, very much; <ls>Śi. 9. 77.</ls>
